biolockj.util

Class BioLockJUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • biolockj.util.BioLockJUtil

  • public class BioLockJUtil
extends Object
    Simple utility containing String manipulation and formatting functions.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String MASTER_PREFIX
      Prefix added to the master Config file: "MASTER_"

    • Constructor Summary

      BioLockJUtil()

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static String formatDigits(Integer input, Integer numDigits)
      This method formats the input number to have a length of at least numDigits.
      Simply add leading zeros until numDigits is reached.
      static String formatPercentage(long num, long denom)
      Build the percentage display string for the num/denom ratio as "##.##%"

      Return an ordered list of the class names from the input collection.

      Concatenate data and return as a comma separated String.

      Return an ordered list of absolute file paths from the input collection.
      static File getMasterConfig()
      Return the MASTER config file.
      static File getSource()
      Get the program source (either the jar path or main class biolockj.BioLockJ);
      static void saveNewMasterConfig()
      Save a single version of the config file by combing with default config files, if any exist.
      static void updateMasterConfig(Map<String,String> props)
      This method removes any given props and then adds the new values.

    • Method Detail

      • formatDigits

        public static String formatDigits(Integer input,
                                  Integer numDigits)
        This method formats the input number to have a length of at least numDigits.
        Simply add leading zeros until numDigits is reached.
        Parameters:
        input - Integer value
        numDigits - Number of digits return value should contain
        Returns:
        number as String with leading zeros.

      • formatPercentage

        public static String formatPercentage(long num,
                                      long denom)
        Build the percentage display string for the num/denom ratio as "##.##%"
        Parameters:
        num - Numerator
        denom - Denominator
        Returns:
        ratio

                      throws ConfigPathException

        Throws:
